verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>;

Unto Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, my own <S%G1103><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%>, mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

As <S%G2531><s%> I besought <S%G3870><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> to abide still <S%G4357><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, when I went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou mightest charge <S%G3853><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that they teach <S%G2085><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> other doctrine <S%G2085><s%>,

Neither <S%G3366><s%> give heed <S%G4337><s%> to fables <S%G3454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> endless <S%G562><s%> genealogies <S%G1076><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> minister <S%G3930><s%> questions <S%G2214><s%>, rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> godly <S%G2316><s%> edifying <S%G3620><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: so do.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of the commandment <S%G3852><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%>:
From which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> having swerved <S%G795><s%> have turned aside <S%G1624><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> vain jangling <S%G3150><s%>; having: or, not aiming at

Desiring <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> teachers of the law <S%G3547><s%>; <S%G3361><s%> understanding <S%G3539><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%>, nor <S%G3383><s%> whereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G5101><s%> they affirm <S%G1226><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> use <S%G5530><s%> it <S%G846><s%> lawfully <S%G3545><s%>;

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G2749><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> made <S%G2749><s%> for a righteous man <S%G1342><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> for the lawless <S%G459><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> disobedient <S%G506><s%>, for the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for sinners <S%G268><s%>, for unholy <S%G462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profane <S%G952><s%>, for murderers of fathers <S%G3964><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> murderers of mothers <S%G3389><s%>, for manslayers <S%G409><s%>,

For whoremongers <S%G4205><s%>, for them that defile themselves with mankind <S%G733><s%>, for menstealers <S%G405><s%>, for liars <S%G5583><s%>, for perjured persons <S%G1965><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> if there be any <S%G1536><s%> other thing <S%G2087><s%> that is contrary <S%G480><s%> to sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%>;

According <S%G2596><s%> to the glorious <S%G1391><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the blessed <S%G3107><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was committed to <S%G4100><s%> my <S%G1473><s%> trust <S%G4100><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hath enabled <S%G1743><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> that he counted <S%G2233><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>, putting me <S%G5087><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%>;

Who <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G5607><s%> before <S%G4386><s%> a blasphemer <S%G989><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a persecutor <S%G1376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> injurious <S%G5197><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> I obtained mercy <S%G1653><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> I did <S%G4160><s%> it ignorantly <S%G50><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> was exceeding abundant <S%G5250><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

This is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptation <S%G594><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>; of whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> chief <S%G4413><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> I obtained mercy <S%G1653><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might shew forth <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>, for <S%G4314><s%> a pattern <S%G5296><s%> to them which should hereafter <S%G3195><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto the King <S%G935><s%> eternal <S%G165><s%>, immortal <S%G862><s%>, invisible <S%G517><s%>, the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, be honour <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

This <S%G5026><s%> charge <S%G3852><s%> I commit <S%G3908><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, son <S%G5043><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the prophecies <S%G4394><s%> which went before <S%G4254><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou <S%G4754><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> mightest war <S%G4754><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> warfare <S%G4752><s%>;

Holding <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> having put away <S%G683><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> have made shipwreck <S%G3489><s%>:

Of whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%>; whom <S%G3739><s%> I have delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto Satan <S%G4567><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may learn <S%G3811><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to blaspheme <S%G987><s%>.
